The player with the most cards in their staging area destroys cards in their staging area until they have the same number of cards in their staging area as their opponent. The player with the most cards in their momentum discards cards from their momentum until they have the same number of cards in their momentum as their opponent. Your turn ends. Only playable from your hand and only on your turn.
